text:
@MarshaBlackburn Senator, #Trump also kept this quiet for months (we have the internal,White House Briefings, remember?) so you are absolutely 💯 correct,

A communist puppet did cover-up #COVID19 FOR MONTHS.

#PutinsPuppet 
#TrumpLiesPeopleDie
